channel.title: Deprecated on Hacking the Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in Deprecated on Hacking the Cloud

item.title: Enumerate Permissions without Logging to CloudTrail
item.description: Original Research: Nick Frichette Link to Tool: aws_stealth_perm_enum As of 5/18/2021, this technique has been resolved and fixed by AWS. Mutating the Content-Type header when making API requests no longer can be used to enumerate permissions of a role or user. This page is maintained for historical and inspiration purposes. After compromising an IAM credential while attacking AWS, your next task will be to determine what permissions that credential has scoped to them.
